hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT EOAP.EOAP_ID, EOAP.CREATOR, EOAP.CREATE_TIME, EOAP.MODIFIER, EOAP.MODIFY_TIME, EOAP.REC_VER, EOAP.REC_STATUS, EOAP.ORG_ID, EOAP_ORDER_NO, EOAP_RESERVATION_NO, EOAP_STATUS, EOAP_METHOD, EOAP_CUSTOMER, EOAP_CONTACTER, EOAP_PHONE, EOAP_UNIT_NAME, EOAP_UNIT_CODE, EOAP_MOBILE, EOAP_CUSTOMER_NO, EOAP_GOODS_NUMBER, EOAP_TYPE, EOAP_DELIVER_TIME, EOAP_SERVICE_TIME, EOAP_CANCEL_REASON, EOAP_REMARK, EOAP.COMPANY_CODE, ESUS.ESUS_USER_NAME_CN AS ESUS_USER_CREATOR_NAME, ESUSM.ESUS_USER_NAME_CN AS ESUS_USER_MODIFIER_NAME, EOAP.SITE_CODE FROM EO_ORDER_RESERVATION EOAP LEFT JOIN ES_USER ESUS ON EOAP.CREATOR=ESUS.ESUS_ID LEFT JOIN ES_USER ESUSM ON EOAP.MODIFIER=ESUSM.ESUS_ID WHERE 1=1 <<AND EOAP_ID LIKE :eoapId>> <<AND CREATOR LIKE :creator>> <<AND CREATE_TIME > :createTimeFrom>> <<AND CREATE_TIME <= :createTimeTo + 1>> <<AND MODIFIER LIKE :modifier>> <<AND MODIFY_TIME > :modifyTimeFrom>> <<AND MODIFY_TIME <= :modifyTimeTo + 1>> <<AND REC_VER LIKE :recVer>> <<AND REC_STATUS LIKE :recStatus>> <<AND ORG_ID LIKE :orgId>> <<AND EOAP_ORDER_NO LIKE :eoapOrderNo>> <<AND EOAP_RESERVATION_NO LIKE :eoapReservationNo>> <<AND EOAP_STATUS LIKE :eoapStatus>> <<AND EOAP_METHOD LIKE :eoapMethod>> <<AND EOAP_CUSTOMER LIKE :eoapCustomer>> <<AND EOAP_CONTACTER LIKE :eoapContacter>> <<AND EOAP_PHONE LIKE :eoapPhone>> <<AND EOAP_GOODS_NUMBER LIKE :eoapGoodsNumber>> <<AND EOAP_TYPE LIKE :eoapType>> <<AND EOAP_DELIVER_TIME > :eoapDeliverTimeFrom>> <<AND EOAP_DELIVER_TIME <= :eoapDeliverTimeTo + 1>> <<AND EOAP_SERVICE_TIME > :eoapServiceTimeFrom>> <<AND EOAP_SERVICE_TIME <= :eoapServiceTimeTo + 1>> <<AND EOAP_CANCEL_REASON LIKE :eoapCancelReason>> <<AND EOAP_REMARK LIKE :eoapRemark>> <<AND COMPANY_CODE LIKE :companyCode>> <<AND SITE_CODE LIKE :siteCode>>
